To generate an image showing the content of the given scene from a top-down aerial perspective, the following concrete visual elements must be included:

*   Suspension bridge deck
*   Main suspension cables of the bridge
*   Vertical suspender cables of the bridge
*   Bridge support towers (tops visible)
*   Bridge railings along the deck
*   Vegetated mountainous terrain surrounding and beneath the bridge
*   Deep valley or gorge spanned by the bridge
*   Small human figures on the bridge deck
